verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: tweeted] [ARG1: thanks to Noblesville teacher Jason Seaman] , [ARGM-ADV: praising him for his " heroic act " in the middle school shooting on Friday] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] tweeted thanks to Noblesville teacher Jason Seaman , [V: praising] [ARG1: him] [ARG2: for his " heroic act " in the middle school shooting on Friday] .
